member.name: T:Google.GData.Calendar.EventEntry
member.summary: Entry API customization class for defining entries in an Event feed.

member.name: F:Google.GData.Calendar.EventEntry.EVENT_CATEGORY
member.summary: Category used to label entries that contain Event extension data.

member.name: M:Google.GData.Calendar.EventEntry.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a new EventEntry instance with the appropriate category to indicate that it is an event.

member.name: M:Google.GData.Calendar.EventEntry.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructs a new EventEntry instance with provided data.
member.param: The descriptive title of the event ("What" in the UI)

member.name: M:Google.GData.Calendar.EventEntry.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Constructs a new EventEntry instance with provided data.
member.param: The descriptive title of the event ("What" in the UI)
A longer description of the event ("Description" in the UI)

member.name: M:Google.GData.Calendar.EventEntry.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Constructs a new EventEntry instance with provided data.
member.param: The descriptive title of the event ("What" in the UI)
A longer description of the event ("Description" in the UI)
The location of the event ("Where" in the UI)

member.summary: helper method to add extensions to the evententry

member.name: M:Google.GData.Calendar.EventEntry.GetFirstReminder
member.summary: returns the first reminder of the Times collection
member.returns: When object for the reminder or NULL

member.name: M:Google.GData.Calendar.EventEntry.CreateAtomSubElement(System.Xml.XmlReader,Google.GData.Client.AtomFeedParser)
member.summary: this is the subclassing method for AtomBase derived classes to overload what childelements should be created needed to create CustomLink type objects, like WebContentLink etc
member.param: The XmlReader that tells us what we are working with
the parser is primarily used for nametable comparisons

member.summary: defines the webcontent rel value for the atom:link

member.summary: Constructs a new Atom link containing a WebContent extension and with the appropriate rel attribute.

member.name: M:Google.GData.Extensions.WebContentLink.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Constructs a new Atom link containing a WebContent extension and with the appropriate rel attribute. This constructor lets you specify if you want the extension element to be created for you. The parser sets this to false as it refuses to override pre-existing elements (even empty ones.)
member.param: Optionally create the web content extension.
